title: High-entropy perovskite fluoride ultrasmall nanoparticles embedded in carbon nanofibers enable accelerated redox kinetic for K storage
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02151G, Paper
Jiaying Liao, Caoyang Shao, Jingchen Han, Zeyu Yuan, Qiao Hu, Yichen Du, Shaohua Guo, Xiaosi Zhou, Haoshen Zhou
With the development of potassium-ion batteries, perovskite fluorides with three-dimensional framework structures and high theoretical capacities are attracting increasing attention. However, their intrinsically low electronic conductivities and high K+ diffusion...
